page.title: 03Social Concern in Maylandsea
page.content: There is considerable concern in the area on a number of counts. {The roads in Maylandsea}have until recently been in a parlous condition . Well attended public meetings have been held for over 15 years- now some are being brought up to standard but others are to be left unadopted. The locals feel there is a need for a {school}in the are as many young children have to travel to ,the nearest schools early in the morning. The council will not act until there are sufficient numbers of children actually in the area There are insufficient facilities for the proposed large increase in housing.Specifically the lack of a {village green}is deplored. 7 - 8 years ago the area so used was sold to a yacht club and the only facility left is a public right of way.
